name: The Monarch Gate
description:
This game was made in less than 3 days for a Game Jam. Game in English.

Made by Nutty171

Made with RPG Maker MV by Kadokawa. This means that it is illegal to use the contained resources unless you own a legal copy of RPG Maker MV.

In this game, you find yourself in a sprawling labyrinth, and you must find keys and defeat enemies to escape within the time limit.

I have made a map of the game for those who do not want to make their own.
